description.zh-cn: 中国儿童文学作家，山东烟台人。
description.en: A Chinese children's literature writer from Yantai, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省下辖的地级市，为吴梦起的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Wu Mengqi.
The middle school that Wu Mengqi attended.

description.zh-cn: 吴梦起曾长期任教的学校。
description.en: The school where Wu Mengqi taught for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体，吴梦起于1980年加入。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China. Wu Mengqi became a member in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家协会在辽宁省的分支机构，吴梦起曾任理事。
description.en: The Liaoning branch of the China Writers Association, where Wu Mengqi served as a director.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议辽宁省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议辽宁省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在辽宁省的地方委员会，吴梦起曾任第五、六届委员。
description.en: The local committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Liaoning Province, where Wu Mengqi served as a member of the fifth and sixth committees.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁省的儿童文学组织，吴梦起曾任会长、名誉会长。
description.en: A children's literature organization in Liaoning Province, where Wu Mengqi served as president and honorary president.

nodes.id: 铁岭市文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 铁岭市文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 铁岭市的文学艺术界联合组织，吴梦起曾任顾问。
description.en: The federation of literary and art circles in Tieling City, where Wu Mengqi served as an advisor.

description.zh-cn: 铁岭市的儿童文学组织，吴梦起曾任顾问。
description.en: A children's literature organization in Tieling City, where Wu Mengqi served as an advisor.

zh-cn: 上海首届儿童文学园丁奖

description.zh-cn: 一项重要的中国儿童文学奖项，吴梦起的作品《老鼠看下棋》曾获此奖。
description.en: An important Chinese children's literature award. Wu Mengqi's work 'The Mouse Watching a Chess Game' won this award.

description.zh-cn: 由中国作家协会主办的儿童文学奖项，吴梦起的作品《老鼠看下棋》曾获第一届奖项。
description.en: A children's literature award sponsored by the China Writers Association. Wu Mengqi's work 'The Mouse Watching a Chess Game' won the first award.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一份儿童文学杂志，曾授予吴梦起的作品《虎牛》年度优秀作品奖。
description.en: A Chinese children's literature magazine that awarded Wu Mengqi's work 'Tiger and Ox' its annual outstanding work prize.

en: Soong Ching Ling Children's Literature Award

description.zh-cn: 以宋庆龄命名的儿童文学奖项，吴梦起的作品集《吴梦起童话选》曾获第四届二等奖。
description.en: A children's literature award named after Soong Ching-ling. Wu Mengqi's collection 'Selected Fairy Tales of Wu Mengqi' won the second prize at the fourth edition.

description.zh-cn: 吴梦起在该校任教直至退休。
description.en: Wu Mengqi taught at this school until his retirement.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议辽宁省委员会
铁岭市文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 其作品《老鼠看下棋》获此奖项。
description.en: His work 'The Mouse Watching a Chess Game' won this award.

description.zh-cn: 其作品《老鼠看下棋》获中国作家协会第一届全国优秀儿童文学奖。
description.en: His work 'The Mouse Watching a Chess Game' won the first National Outstanding Children's Literature Award from the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 其作品《虎牛》获该杂志1985年度优秀作品奖。
description.en: His work 'Tiger and Ox' won the magazine's 1985 annual outstanding work award.

description.zh-cn: 其作品集《吴梦起童话选》获第四届宋庆龄儿童文学奖二等奖。
description.en: His collection 'Selected Fairy Tales of Wu Mengqi' won the second prize at the fourth Soong Ching Ling Children's Literature Award.
